name: GM4 Lively Lily Pads
description: Allow decorative blocks to be placed on lily pads for vibrant water builds.

build: execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run fill ~-2 ~ ~-2 ~2 ~ ~2 minecraft:air
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run fill ~-2 ~-1 ~-2 ~2 ~-1 ~2 minecraft:water
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run setblock ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:lily_pad
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run setblock ~1 ~-1 ~ minecraft:lily_pad
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run setblock ~-1 ~-1 ~ minecraft:lily_pad
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run setblock ~ ~-1 ~1 minecraft:lily_pad
execute in {world} positioned {x} {y} {z} run setblock ~ ~-1 ~-1 minecraft:lily_pad
